interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Shirley Temple Collection: Volume 3
Review Date: 2013/03/22
Store: Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, All Fox Titles
Product Description: ['Includes Dimples, The Little Colonel & The Littlest Rebel.']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Kids & Family, Musicals & Performing Arts/Musicals/General', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, Full Screen, Subtitled, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'SHIRLEY TEMPLE COLLECTION 3', 'Language': 'Unqualified (Stereo)', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '99202', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, Full Screen, Subtitled, NTSC', 'Release date': 'January 13, 2015', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish', 'Studio': '20th Century Fox', 'Number of discs': '6'}
Review Text: I bought this series for my granddaughter.  I grew up with Shirley Temple as a household world when I was a child and I wanted her to see this wonderful child actress.  She loves the movies as I do.
Review Title: Shirley Temple Collection
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Nostalgia for Classic Film**: The user has a strong affinity for classic films, particularly those featuring iconic child stars, indicating a preference for timeless entertainment.
  
- **Family-Oriented**: The purchase was motivated by the desire to share cherished childhood memories with a grandchild, highlighting a familial approach to entertainment choices.
  
- **Enjoyment of Musicals and Family Films**: The user specifically selects films categorized under kids & family as well as musicals, suggesting a penchant for engaging and uplifting content.

- **Interest in Special Collections**: The choice of a box set implies a preference for curated collections that provide additional value, such as multiple films in one package.

- **Positive Rating System**: The user demonstrates a tendency to rate films highly (5.0 rating) when they meet personal or relational enjoyment, indicating high standards for enjoyment and satisfaction.

- **Subtitles and Multiple Formats**: The inclusion of a collection with different language subtitles suggests an appreciation for accessibility and possibly a consideration for diverse audiences.

Overall, the user exhibits a blend of nostalgia, a focus on family engagement, and an appreciation for classic entertainment formats.
